articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
✨The DeFi Pulse Index is the leading benchmark of the decentralized finance sector. 
The index is maintained by DeFi Pulse's index division @Scalara_xyz and is available as a single token $DPI implemented by @indexcoop.
Scalara: Over the last 7 days, the DeFi Pulse Index grew 10% when measured in ETH. $DPI
Best performers were @compoundfinance, @aave and @iearnfinance.
Compound was even up in USD terms, despite the overall market rout.
articles.title: ✨The DeFi Pulse Index is the leading benchmark of the decentralized finance sector. The index is maintained by DeFi Pulse's index division @Scalara_x...

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
RT Nathan Howard
It's been a busy month or so for crypto and DeFi regulation. Join us this Tuesday as @JWVerret helps make sense of it all (in a way that isn't legal advice).
DeFi Pulse 🍇: Join host @fallow8DeFi as we kick off Money Legos: Building the Financial Infrastructure of the Future.
The first topic is a hot one— the future of DeFi Regulation w/ Blockchain Law Professor @JWVerret. 
🗓Sept 27  ⏰ 12pm EST/4pm UTC
Set a reminder:
 https://youtu.be/gkYXKUvvaNo
